songs.title: Trust Me
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Justin Bieber]
You want me to trust you, but how much do you trust me?
You want me to love you, but how much do you love me?
If I was wrong then you was wrong too, you're the one I’m holding on to
You're the one that broke the code that was on the phone and started scrolling through
You want me to trust you, but how much do you trust me?

[Verse 1: Justin Bieber]
First off this started when you broke in my phone (aye girl)
And I know how you like to blame me for everything
Girl, but you were wrong (but you were wrong)
But do it really matter though?

[Pre-Chorus: Justin Bieber]
I feel like me and you girl, we had it all
I'm wishing on a star
Girl, tell me where you are or how you been
Gotta tell you now, we may never speak again
Baby when you’re wrong I gotta let you know that you're wrong
You know you should of never went upstairs and broke into my phone

[Chorus: Justin Bieber]
You want me to trust you, but how much do you trust me?
You want me to love you, but how much do you love me?
If I was wrong then you was wrong too, you're the one I'm holding on to
You're the one that broke the code that was on the phone and started scrolling through
You want me to trust you, but how much do you trust me?

[Verse 2: Justin Bieber]
Girl I miss the days when it was just you and me
Me and you going through the storm, baby tell me do you still believe
Or is it all gone?

[Pre-Chorus: Justin Bieber]
I feel like me and you girl, we had it all
I'm wishing on a star
Girl, tell me where you are or how you been
Gotta tell you now, we may never speak again
Baby when you're wrong I gotta let you know that you're wrong
You know you should of never went upstairs and broke into my phone

[Chorus: Justin Bieber]
You want me to trust you, but how much do you trust me?
You want me to love you, but how much do you love me?
If I was wrong then you was wrong too, you’re the one I’m holding on to
You're the one that broke the code that was on the phone and started scrolling through
You want me to trust you, but how much do you trust me?

[Verse 3: (?)]
Hold on
Bet you didn’t think I knew that code huh, no
Bet you didn't think I'd go upstairs and call that girl huh, no
Bet you didn't think I threw your phone into that door huh, no
I expected you to have something there but not them photos
And I found that text, I really don’t know what we gon' do next
I really don't know how we gon' fix it, boy look at this mess
Been crying all night and my makeup ruined, boy look at this stress
Boy look at this stress, boy look at this stress

[Chorus: Justin Bieber]
You want me to trust you, but how much do you trust me?
You want me to love you, but how much do you love me?
If I was wrong then you was wrong too, you're the one I'm holding on to
You're the one that broke the code that was on the phone and started scrolling through
You want me to trust you, but how much do you trust me?
